plot: Spike, Faye and Jet are all after Decker, a bounty head in possession of high explosives. They meet V.T, a female space trucker, and team up with her to catch Decker on a dangerous chase through an abandoned mine.

Spike, Jet, and Faye go after another bounty named Decker. Spike has a hunch that Decker would be blending in at a bar. Course the bar he went to is full of all the bounty hunters in town. Spike meets a female Space Trucker name V.T. Very few people know what her real name is. So every time they try to guess what it is they'd have to bet on it. If they loose she gets the money, if they win they receive all the money she won on the bets. Meanwhile Faye found Decker at an ice cream parlor, only to discover that this bounty is known for using high explosives for weapons. And the chase is on to catch Decker.—J LeGault
